directions: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat.  Saute onions until tender.  Stir in brown sugar, ketchup, vinegar, mustard, Worcestershire sauce and pepper sauce.  Simmer, stirring occasionally, for 20 minutes.
Place sausage in a slow cooker with the sauce and onions.  Cook on low for 4 to 5 hours.  The longer it simmers the better!
ingredients: 1 pound kielbasa sausage, cut into 1 inch pieces
title: Slow Cooker Sweet and Sour Kielbasa
